<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Manifold Modifications](/Feats.aspx?ID=3066) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
<trait label="Modification" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=410" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 28</row>

**Prerequisites**
[initial modification](/Classes.aspx?ID=19)

</column>

---

You've modified your innovation using clever workarounds, so you can include another initial modification without compromising its structure. Your innovation gains an additional initial modification from the list for [innovations](/classes/inventor/innovations) of its type.
name: Manifold Modifications
